import React from 'react'; import'tachyons'; class SignIn extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { email: '', //state to hold email of user password: '' //state to hold password of user } this.handleEmail = this.handleEmail.bind(this); //bind the func to handle this in callback this.handlePassword = this.handlePassword.bind(this); //bind the func to handle this in callback } handleEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); //to prevent default init console.log(e.target.value); //print value in console } render(){ const {onRouteChange} = this.props; return(
Sign In
onRouteChange('home')} className="b ph3 pv2 input-reset ba b--black bg-transparent grow pointer f6 dib" type="submit" value="Sign in"/>

onRouteChange('register')} className="f6 link dim black db pointer"> Register

); //return ends here } //render ends here } export default SignIn;
